## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction point at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal extraction point (position unknown)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items without required ingredients
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plates are required to craft iron-gear-wheels, and you need to have them available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
